ingredients.ingredient: 2 cloves garlic, finely minced, or more to taste

cookingTips: Toast bread slices until golden and crisp to provide structure and prevent sogginess
Rub warm toasted bread with a whole garlic clove for subtle, infused flavor
Assemble bruschetta just before serving to keep bread crisp and avocado fresh
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How do you toast bread to the perfect crispness, and how do you prevent avocado from browning on assembled bruschetta?
